title: How To Buff Vayne Without Breaking Her

replies.body: {{champion:67}} doesn't build {{item:3142}} {{item:3085}} {{item:3071}} or {{item:3078}} like the other adcs so she kinda needs help.
God forbid an ADC actually builds ADC items and doesn't consistently dip into assassin/fighter items

The meta is what it is unfortunately :(
Not using the op items right now is like shooting yourself in the foot.

How? That changes nothing. WHAT'S THIS BOARDS PROBLEM WITH BUFFING VAYNE? WHY CAN'T BAD CHAMPIONS GET BUFFED? Is it because you people let her hit 3-4 items? Is it because you don't want Vayne to be popular in your ELO? I mean, come on people, AT LEAST UNDERSTAND THE GAME before you complain.
The irony in this post is palpable.
To bad, it's true. Vayne sucks, she needs buffs, stop complaining because you let her hit late game.

Look, kid. I couldn't care less about Vayne. I'm not the one complaining, you are. Your post is ironic because you're complaining about people complaining.

Besides, I'm a Veigar main. I **want** late game.
----------------------------------------
Also, it seems you might need these:

http://www.dictionary.com/browse/irony
http://www.dictionary.com/browse/palpable
http://www.dictionary.com/browse/too

Funny thing is though as a master rank player myself even slivers know things I don't. Some people are better at analyzing certain things rather then executing them.
hey high elo no backtalk

Said a boosted animal.
I've seen your graph few weeks ago.
Before you got to diamond there were almost few losses and ELO losses from silver to Diamond.
Clearly boosted.

ya cus gold and below is freelo

plat and diamond is where you start having a harder time cus ur playing against real players

EUNE xd no backtalk

Another region kid.
Idiots like you need to understand that there is no difference between region's skill
Eune is worst region xd

I can relate,however neither you nor me played all the regions,so we can't really decide.
But even with all the PL stars there,there is almost nonexistent diffeence in skill
not about skill, EUNE is just land of the scrublords
And that means?
i didnt ask your opinion,i ask what does "scrublord" mean
NA>EU
nobody at any elo wants vayne to be popular..

> [{quoted}](name=HaloDragonX,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LGixPrFG,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2016-07-22T16:48:22.951+0000)
>
> How? That changes nothing. WHAT'S THIS BOARDS PROBLEM WITH BUFFING VAYNE? WHY CAN'T BAD CHAMPIONS GET BUFFED? Is it because you people let her hit 3-4 items? Is it because you don't want Vayne to be popular in your ELO? I mean, come on people, AT LEAST UNDERSTAND THE GAME before you complain.

Because Vayne has that problem where even a 1% buff has the chance to put her way over the edge. Season 5 was a time where no one wanted to deal with her and she was freelo in yoloque. Vayne players themselves were hard to play with even, the whole 5v1 attitude wasn't a joke.
If Vayne is too strong against tanks to get buffed but to weak against some champions like Caitlyn then Vayne can't get buffed.
She's so good against tanks, Caitlyn or any other ADC does nearly just as good.
Vayne needs zero buffs, she is plenty strong if you can play her right.

> [{quoted}](name=Lugg,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LGixPrFG,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-07-22T15:02:08.614+0000)
>
> Vayne needs zero buffs, she is plenty strong if you can play her right.

Thats why the only buff she should get is her counterpicks get nerfed
More like right click
You mean nerf Jhin and Ashe, since they're both stronger against Vayne and stronger overall.
Jhin needs a serious nerf, tbh.

Nice how all the freelo adc "mains" are downvoting you. 
53% winrate with a 25% pickrate is lucian level broken. 
Not to forget that Jhin player have the third lowest average games on him. 
And ashe sits on 54% winrate with 20% playrate. 
I'd imagine Zed or Yasuo in such a state for two patches now. 
Boards would break down.

> [{quoted}](name=FantasySniper,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LGixPrFG,comment-id=000f0001,timestamp=2016-07-23T04:58:56.030+0000)

> Jhin needs a serious nerf, tbh.

Why he needs a snare with the range of a Lux ult I'l never fucking know.

Like, "Oh boy my midlaner landed a slow on me, I guess I deserve to get snared from 3000 units away"

> [{quoted}](name=FantasySniper,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LGixPrFG,comment-id=000f0001,timestamp=2016-07-23T04:58:56.030+0000)
>
> Jhin needs a serious nerf, tbh.

If they remove the DFT  mastery next season/pre-season, he will become a joke.
Warlord's Bloodlust is better on Jhin
No, DFT is used on him because he gets a massive AD steroid from his passive.

I dunno about those; sure they do zone her out hard in lane but they always lose if the vayne just sucks it up and plays safe, or has a support that can tank/negate their poke. Caitlyn is the only one who can actually both keep up with her in damage later in the game and still zone her out during laning phase.
it's not like jhin can one shot people..... oh wait.
It's not like Jhin can't escape when caught up and isn't blown up in 2 seconds...oh wait.

Vayne's problem is she loses lane and gets outscaled lmao. ADCs who outscale Vayne {{champion:29}}  {{champion:222}} {{champion:96}} {{champion:21}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:202}} {{champion:22}} {{champion:15}}. I think the only adc who doesnt outscale vayne is Kalista lmao
Rip Kalista {{champion:429}} {{item:3070}}
Hopefully she stays dead

ezreal and MF dont outscale anything, they have strong midgame spikes.

and lesbi honest nothing truly outscales max attack speed vayne outside of kog (who has 2x as much AS and similar AS scaling)

Yes MF does not outscale a 550 range adc whose only steroid is small ad buffs. It's not like mf has a ad or a massive AS buff herself. You obv know what you are talking about sitting in Bronze 3 with a 38% WR. lol.

ignorant comments aside, MF gains nothing from scaling into lategame outside of her ultimate scaling with crit. yes. mf can gain attack speed weeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee... doesnt do much for her kit. at all. fully built attack speed vayne actually has the best scaling steroid in the game outside of kogmaw. no its not her AD its her bolts you daft fuck
